attributes.action: Make light 4 wheelers (buggies) legal for 14+ year olds to drive on the road.
attributes.additional_details: E.g go karts and buggies and small quads
attributes.background: Light 4 wheelers can be things such as projects you make with family which you have then gone ahead and make road legal. I believe people 14 and above should have the right to ride them on the road as they've made them and they should recieve a licence not for cars but for light 4 wheelers(buggies)
